page.title: 16Brisley, Children's playtime
page.content:
Most of the children enjoy watching T.V., reading and drawing. Building model ships and aircraft and models from Lego are enjoyed by some, while others say that they enjoy playing cards, pool, with Cindy dolls, Action Men and model soldiers.
Outside play includes Swingball, bowls, baseball, volleyball, skipping and building bases.
On the school playground there is a good surface for roller skating. At playtime people sometimes choose to play games such as football and rounders. Other games include run across, tig, hide and seek and army.
